action.des: Pitcher Change: Matt Reynolds replaces Rex Brothers, batting 6th, replacing right fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Eric Young remains in the game as the right fielder.

atbat.des: Clayton Kershaw singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Carlos Gonzalez.

pitch.cc: Matt Reynolds went back to the four-seam fastball even though Clayton Kershaw hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Dee Gordon singles on a bunt ground ball to catcher Jose Morales. Clayton Kershaw scores. Dee Gordon to 2nd. Throwing error by catcher Jose Morales.

pitch.cc: Matt Reynolds went back to the four-seam fastball even though Dee Gordon hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Casey Blake doubles (5) on a fly ball to center fielder Carlos Gonzalez. Dee Gordon scores.

action.des: With Andre Ethier batting, wild pitch by Matt Reynolds, Casey Blake to 3rd.

atbat.des: Andre Ethier out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Charlie Blackmon. Casey Blake scores.

pitch.cc: Matt Reynolds went back to the four-seam fastball even though Andre Ethier hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Matt Kemp doubles (13) on a line drive to left fielder Charlie Blackmon.
Matt Reynolds intentionally walks Juan Uribe.
James Loney flies out to right fielder Eric Young.

pitch.cc: Matt Reynolds went back to the four-seam fastball even though James Loney hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Dioner Navarro grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Todd Helton.

pitch.cc: Matt Reynolds is getting squeezed this inning by home plate ump Tim McClelland.

atbat.des: Charlie Blackmon singles on a ground ball to right fielder Andre Ethier.
Jose Morales singles on a line drive to center fielder Matt Kemp. Charlie Blackmon to 2nd.
Eric Young walks. Charlie Blackmon to 3rd. Jose Morales to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Clayton Kershaw; Eric Young is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .596 OPS against them and .481 against everything else.
Clayton Kershaw is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Scott Elbert replaces Clayton Kershaw, batting 9th.

atbat.des: Carlos Gonzalez singles on a line drive to right fielder Andre Ethier. Charlie Blackmon scores. Jose Morales to 3rd. Eric Young to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Scott Elbert went back to the slider even though Carlos Gonzalez hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Todd Helton walks. Jose Morales scores. Eric Young to 3rd. Carlos Gonzalez to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Scott Elbert went back to the four-seam fastball even though Todd Helton hit for a single last time up.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Mike MacDougal replaces Scott Elbert, batting 9th.

atbat.des: Troy Tulowitzki singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Andre Ethier. Eric Young scores. Carlos Gonzalez scores. Todd Helton to 3rd.
Ty Wigginton hit by pitch. Troy Tulowitzki to 2nd.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Jason Giambi replaces Matt Reynolds.

atbat.des: Jason Giambi walks. Todd Helton scores. Troy Tulowitzki to 3rd. Ty Wigginton to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Mike MacDougal; Jason Giambi is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a 1.240 OPS against them and .931 against everything else.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Aaron Cook replaces Jason Giambi.
Pitcher Change: Blake Hawksworth replaces Mike MacDougal, batting 9th.

atbat.des: Charlie Blackmon pops out to third baseman Casey Blake in foul territory.

pitch.cc: Blake Hawksworth is trying to tie up Charlie Blackmon with fastballs inside, where Charlie Blackmon hits .000.

atbat.des: Jose Morales grounds out sharply, second baseman Juan Uribe to first baseman James Loney.
